sentences.en: A small minority takes refuge ( as it always has ) in mindless radicalism.

sentences.en: All this argues for deep thinking and radicalism.
sentences.cn: 所有这些都赞成需要深入思考和激进胆大.

sentences.en: Education produced intellectual ferment and the temptations of radicalism.
sentences.cn: 教育带来知识界的骚动,促使激进主义具有了吸引力.

sentences.en: Short of such radicalism , we must approach the task in a more subtle manner.
